title: Moldova Retail Sales YoY
description: Retail Sales in Moldova decreased 4.50 percent in August of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Retail Sales YoY in Moldova averaged 5.02 percent from 2011 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 66.10 percent in April of 2021 and a record low of -28.20 percent in April of 2020. In Moldova, the year-over-year change in Retail sales compares the aggregated sales of retail goods and services during a certain month to the same month a year ago. This page provides the latest reported value for - Moldova Retail Sales YoY - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: National Bureau of Statistics of the Republic of Moldova
